content:
10 Steps to Being a Better Super Villain  
 Infographic source: jacamo.co.uk 
 James Bond has reached his 50th anniversary. A landmark year, which he wouldn’t have managed without coming up against some pretty inept super villains. If they had just taken some of these simple steps they may have been the one to foil Bond, rather than having him putting a stop to their dastardly plans at every turn. 
 Infographic Love

Skip-a-Year Mortgage Sweepstakes  
 Infographic source: Quicken Loans 
 The average person works over 600 hours a year to pay their mortgage. This infographic explores what you could do with that money if you did not have to pay your mortgage for an entire year. 
 Designed by beckon.co in partnership with Quicken Loans to promote their mortgage sweepstakes giveaway. quickenloans.com 
 Infographic Love

24 Hours in the Google Economy  
 Infographic source: Wordstream 
 Fascinating data about the google economy and How Google makes over $100 million dollars a day with search advertising and the top ten industries that spent the most on Google ads in Q3 2012. The amount of money that Google makes is unbelievable. 
 Infographic Love

A Taxonomy of Arse  
 Infographic source: Friday Project 
 From the Friday Project portfolio of work by Stephen Wildish – this is a great example of creativity on a free reign. I’m not usually an advocate of swearing but I thought this was a great visualization of the word. Wildish publishes a new project every friday, something whimsical, witty or pretty. A great way to keep the saw sharp by working on personal projects and let the imagination run free. 
 Infographic Love

The Conversion Rate Optimization Report 2012  
 Infographic source: Econsultancy 
 Visualisation of the Econsultancy Red Eye conversion rate optimization report 2012 
 Analysis of the survey data shows the four variables most strongly correlated with improved website conversion and sales are: 
1 Perceived control 
2 Having someone directly responsible 
3 Incentivising staff 
4 A structures approach 
 Infographic Love

The Essential Equity Release Factsheet  
 Infographic source: equityrelease.net 
 A nuts and bolts visual guide to home equity release services and products currently available in the United Kingdom. 
 Infographic Love

30 Ways To Promote Your Blog Posts  
 Infographic source: LaunchGrowJoy 
 You spent hours researching, writing, finding graphics and uploading your blog posts but your work isnt done yet. To get the most out of each article you need to promote it as much as you can. Above are 30 ways you can promote each post most of which are free. With a little work and planning you can get the most out of each post. 
 Infographic Love

Who’s Afraid of the Big Bad Cloud?  
 Infographic source: CA Technologies 
 Is your IT organization clouding the issue? Is your organization innovation or is it stopped by a cold front? There’s little dispute that the cloud’s powers innovation but innovation means scary changes! It’s time to chill: 80% of respondents cited cloud computing as a driver of IT and business innovation. But of those 53% have no plans to implement! And of those who said they plan to budget 60% said they will take the next two years to allocate budget for their cloud computing initiatives. 
 Amazing infotoon design – definitely the way forward for infographics. 
 Infographic Love

Practice Makes Perfect (Malcolm Gladwell Outliers Visualized)  
 Infographic source: Zintro 
 I recommend you read Malcolm Gladwell, Outliers, it’s an excellent book and talks about what makes individuals outstanding in their field – not as you would imagine being a gifted person but it all comes down to being born in the right place at the right time and putting in hours and hours of practice. ten thousand hours of practice to be exact is the number of hours you have to devote to a subject to be an expert – this usually equates to about ten years. I highly recommend the book and I was so pleased to find the Practice Makes Perfect infographic which illustrated Malcolm Gladwell’s brilliant writing. 
 Infographic Love

The Reddit Marketing Field Guide  
 Infographic source: Prestige Marketing 
 The Reddit Marketing Field guide is an overview of the power of the social bookmarking site. Reddit happens to be one of my favourite site and has been overlooked for marketing potential due to its unpredictable users who resist manipulation and can smell advertising scams a mile away. Redditors were mercenary on Woody Harrleson when he held an ask me anything (AMA) session which was a thinly veiled promotion for his new film release which then got torn to shreds after he got on the wrong side of the community. 
 Use Reddit at your peril if you are a newcomer but if you can respect the community this is one of the most powerful social media sites for going viral. Be creative and choose the right subreddit to seed on and don’t talk crap! 
 Infographic Love
